long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nutri provides nutrition information and robust health analysis for food products online. Users can bookmark items with the Nutri extension in order to seamlessly compare the quality of different products. Nutri provides clearly labeled benefits and drawbacks as well as an overall nutrition grade for every item being examined. Armed with these metrics, users can make more informed shopping decisions in order to live healthier lives.
